hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest
